item.description:
Our Living in Your Heart gatherings are at the heart of what we do.  In these gatherings you come to a deeper understanding of yourself, your abilities and your understanding of life in general.  Based on Navajo teachings, it is primarily an experiential gathering.  Past members have learned about healing, being more positive in their lives, and using their abilities.

The cost is $85 for four classes, regardless of attendance, or $35 a class.  You are free to stay with the gathering as long as you like (we currently have people who have been studying for over 5 years) and you are free to leave when you feel you are no longer benefitting.   

 

Please let me know if you are interested or if you have any questions before you decide to RSVP, as advance payment is required.   If you pay the $35 and decide to stay for the next three gatherings, you can simply pay the balance of $50.

 

Note:  Once you choose a Tuesday or Wednesday gathering, you cannot switch after the first six weeks.
item.how_to_find_us: come in at the upper porch level
item.name: Living in Your Heart Gathering
